original_title: Hatsune Miku: Miku Expo 2015 in Shanghai
overview: HATSUNE MIKU EXPO 2015 in SHANGHAI was held at the Shanghai Fengyun E-SPORTS Arena in Shanghai, China in June 2015. It was accompanied by a two-day exhibition which featured a life-sized Miku statue based on her original illustration by KEI.
title: Hatsune Miku: Miku Expo 2015 in Shanghai
